data.message: I'm a big fan and bought all your CDs but lately you been into politics  and also fantasizing to sexually assaulting a woman in your song just because she supports Trump? Since I'm a Trump supporter what are you going to do ??? Kill me??? I'm going to throw away all your CDs in the trash....

replies.message: Jeanette Mediana Revilla  😝
Eminem been say stuff like that since the beginning
Yeah its nothing new
You clearly haven't listened to those CDs if you're surprised by this.
He gonna kill you, you ain't nothing but a slut to him. You ain't got the balls to beef
From the beginning he was like that now cus he is dissing the one that you support u mad? Lel :v

No honey. He's trying to get under your skin and it's working. Yo u have to take Em with a grain of salt. His lines are like watching a scary movie....horrifying? Yes. But when the cameras are off it's all just makeup and acting.
Tyler Jacques hahaha yeah well said mate

Em is washed up, he knows that talking shit about Trump might get himself back in the spotlight again.  Not going to happen.  He is nothing more than a has been.  I think he is jealous Trump is going to make Detroit great again and he could not do shit to help his own city.
I really don't think it matters to Em if trump won or Hillary won. He's been saying shit about the presidents ever since he's started his career
He didn't say shit about the last one.
Don't throw they away, i will give You My adress You can send me all The cd's.. 😜😂
You've been a big fan? 😂😭 seems like you forgot he's always be say that kind of stuff in his raps ever since the beginning haha every album lol get that dumb shit outta here for real
He's a pos loser feminem
He's a pos loser feminem
So did u completely miss the Eminem show 😂😂😂

lol he didnt say shit about obama cause he black and if he said anything about gay ass obama blacks would of said he was racist and it wouldve spread cause thats what black people do cause drama and think everything is racist

So just because he doesn't like Ann Coulter or Trump you're gonna bitch and whine about it?
People are so sensitive.
And really ? Does everyone think Eminem would kill or slap a woman? Its a song get over it.
You one dumbass bitch have you the song kill you or im shady? Like come on lmao and he roasted hillary in his SSLP album and he roasted bush 😂
That's fine toss em away you already bought them so I don't think he cares lol
And if you really got all his cds you'd know this ain't the first timers talked like that fuckin idiot lol
Oh... Girl breaks my heart 2 see u heartbrokn.u talk shit about rap god!ever heard da term sodomize.he will do dat 2 u.so watch ur fuckn mouth & think twice b4 spillin shit about him.
